game.name: Crystalfall
game.genres: 액션, 어드벤처, 인디, RPG, 무료 플레이
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, 앱 내 구매
game.shortDescription: Crystalfall is a classic hack ‘n’ slash Action RPG with randomized dungeons, procedural skills and an endless endgame. Choose your class and survive in a world destroyed by a mysterious asteroid, fighting steampunk enemies in search of epic loot.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Crystalfall is a classic hack ‘n’ slash Action RPG with randomized dungeons, procedural skills and an endless endgame. Choose your class and survive in a world destroyed by a mysterious asteroid, fighting steampunk enemies in search of epic loot.
